items.question: How can I get a project quote?
items.answer: If you fill out the inquiry form, we will provide an initial quote within 24 hours. For an accurate quote, please provide detailed requirements.

items.question: How long does development take?
items.answer: It depends on the scale and complexity of the project, but typically web projects take 4-12 weeks and AI projects take 8-16 weeks.

items.question: Do you provide maintenance services?
items.answer: Yes, we provide 6 months of free maintenance after development completion, and paid maintenance services are available afterwards.

items.question: Is remote development possible?
items.answer: Yes, remote development is possible. We share progress and receive feedback through regular video conferences.
